    • Method Detail

      • getMultiplicationMatrix

        default java.util.Map<Vector,VectorSpaceHomomorphism> getMultiplicationMatrix()
        In case of a finitely dimensional vector space over the field, multiplication within the algebra can be described as a set of linear mappings. In detail, we need to explain, how base elements are multiplied.
        Specified by:
        getMultiplicationMatrix in interface EuclideanAlgebra
        Returns:
        the multiplication map - for every base vector vec1 it gives a linear mapping Vector vec2 - getField().product(vec1,vec2)
